Nightlight::

"I don't like erase his memories neither" said Nightlight "But what 
about if he gets his memories back and if he wants kill us???? that 
worry me... I don't know what would be better... He's so nice now... 
I can't belive that he wanted to kill us some hours ago..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Hmm.  I don't think we should mess with his memories.  If they 
come back 
> it's his choice to stay with us or not.  I wouldn't feel right 
subjecting him 
> to that.  If he accepts it on his own... I suppose I couldn't 
object to it."  
> He grimaces and frowns.  "What about you Nightlight?  What do you 
think?"
